description: Joint Initiative on the Response to HIV/AIDS in the Arab States Region

subproject.gender code: Gender Equality as a principal objective
subproject.title: HIV/AIDS Regional Programme in

subproject.description: The Programme serves 20 states in the Arab region and focuses on the attainment of Millennium Development Goal number 6 by halting and reversing the spread of HIV/AIDS by 2015, and the goals set by the UN General Assembly Special Session on HIV/AIDS. Capacity building activities are undertaken in response to specific requests from UNDP country offices and our stakeholders, in partnership with the Bureau for Development Policy, HIV/AIDS Group, Regional Bureau, the UNAIDS Secretariat and cosponsors and other partners.
subproject.gender code: Gender Equality as a principal objective
subproject.title: HARPAS/OFID Joint Initiative
